name: Cairoplot
body:
**CairoPlot** was born as an attempt to plot beautiful charts for presentations, papers and websites. Using [python][] and [pycairo][], it's possible to create 8 different cool kinds of charts.

##Available charts

###Horizontal Bar Plot

###Vertical Bar Plot

### Scatter Plot

###Dot Lines Plot

###Pie Charts

###Donut Charts

###Gantt Charts


[python]: http://www.python.org/
[pycairo]: http://www.cairographics.org/pycairo/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
